typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID_ESTACIO as decimal(8,0),
		ID_PLA as decimal(8,0),
		ID_ESTAT as decimal(1,0),
		ID_ESTACIO_AFIN as decimal(8,0),
		ID_DETECTOR as decimal(3,0),
		ID_EQUIP as decimal(3,0),
		ID_ALIMENTACIO as decimal(3,0),
		ID_TIPUS_ESTACIO as decimal(2,0),
		ID_FACTOR as decimal(8,0),
		ID_PLANOL as decimal(8,0),
		ID_ESTACIO_REF_1 as decimal(8,0),
		ID_ESTACIO_REF_2 as decimal(8,0),
		ID_LLOGARET as string,
		COD_INE as string,
		COD_ESTACIO as string,
		COD_ORGANISME as string,
		COD_CARRETERA as string,
		COD_MOD_CARRETERA as decimal(15,0),
		COD_TRAM as string,
		COD_SUBTRAM as string,
		NUM_TELEFON as decimal(12,0),
		DESC_ESTACIO as string,
		DESC_OBSERVACIONS as string,
		PK as decimal(9,0),
		METRES_PK as decimal(4,0),
		UTMX as decimal(10,2),
		UTMY as decimal(10,2),
		PK_INI as decimal(9,0),
		METRES_PK_INI as decimal(4,0),
		DESC_PK_INI as string,
		PK_FI as decimal(9,0),
		METRES_PK_FI as decimal(4,0),
		DESC_PK_FI as string,
		IND_IMD as decimal(8,0),
		IND_PESANTS as decimal(7,4),
		IND_IFA as decimal(7,4),
		IND_VELOC_MITJA as decimal(7,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DMDimEstacioSubtrm5
source(output(
		CODI_INE as string,
		COD_MUNICIPI as string,
		DESC_MUNICIPI as string,
		CODI_LLOGARET as string,
		DESC_POBLACIO as string,
		CODI_COMARCA as string,
		DESC_COMARCA as string,
		CODI_PROVINCIA as string,
		DESC_PROVINCIA as string,
		CODI_AMBIT as string,
		DESC_AMBIT as string,
		CODI_VEGUERIA as string,
		DESC_VEGUERIA as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> MestresDMTerritorial
source(output(
		ID_PLA as decimal(8,0),
		ID_ORGANISME as string,
		ID_PLA_GENERAL as decimal(8,0),
		ID_ESTAT_PLA as decimal(1,0),
		DESC_PLA as string,
		FLAG_PENDENT as decimal(1,0),
		FLAG_FINALITZAT as decimal(1,0),
		DATA_INI as timestamp,
		DATA_FI as timestamp,
		DATA_INI_PROCES as timestamp,
		DATA_FI_PROCES as timestamp,
		DATA_GENERAT as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DMDimPla
source(output(
		ID_COMARCA as decimal(2,0),
		COD_ORGTRAM as string,
		COD_ORGANISME as string,
		COD_CARRETERA as string,
		COD_TRAM as string,
		COD_SUBTRAM as string,
		NUM_MODIFICACIO as decimal(15,0),
		DESC_SUBTRAM as string,
		PK_INI as decimal(9,0),
		METRES_PK_INI as decimal(4,0),
		DESC_PK_INI as string,
		PK_FI as decimal(9,0),
		METRES_PK_FI as decimal(4,0),
		DESC_PK_FI as string,
		DESC_CARRILS as string,
		NUM_LONGITUD_REAL as decimal(9,3),
		DATA_MODIFICACIO as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DMDimSubtrams
DMDimEstacioSubtrm5, DMDimPla join(DMDimEstacioSubtrm5@ID_PLA == DMDimPla@ID_PLA,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		ID_TIPUS_ESTACIO,
		ID_LLOGARET,
		COD_INE,
		COD_MOD_CARRETERA,
		COD_TRAM,
		COD_SUBTRAM,
		PK_INI,
		METRES_PK_INI,
		PK_FI,
		METRES_PK_FI,
		IND_IMD,
		IND_PESANTS,
		DATA_INI,
		COD_CARRETERA
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FiltraCampos
FiltraCampos, MestresDMTerritorial join(ID_LLOGARET == CODI_LLOGARET
	&& COD_INE == CODI_INE,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		ID_TIPUS_ESTACIO,
		COD_MOD_CARRETERA,
		COD_TRAM,
		COD_SUBTRAM,
		COD_CARRETERA,
		PK_INI,
		METRES_PK_INI,
		PK_FI,
		METRES_PK_FI,
		IND_IMD,
		IND_PESANTS,
		DESC_PROVINCIA,
		DATA_ANY_PLA = DATA_INI
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FiltraCampos2
FiltraCampos3 derive(DATA_ANY_PLA = year(DATA_ANY_PLA),
		IND_LONGITUD = toDecimal((toDecimal(PK_FI)+(toDecimal(METRES_PK_FI)/1000))-(toDecimal(PK_INI)+(toDecimal(METRES_PK_INI)/1000))),
		IND_PESANTS = toDecimal(IND_PESANTS)) ~> CalculaIND
FiltraCampos2, DMDimSubtrams join(FiltraCampos2@COD_CARRETERA == DMDimSubtrams@COD_CARRETERA
	&& FiltraCampos2@COD_TRAM == DMDimSubtrams@COD_TRAM
	&& FiltraCampos2@COD_SUBTRAM == DMDimSubtrams@COD_SUBTRAM
	&& COD_MOD_CARRETERA == NUM_MODIFICACIO,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
Join3 select(mapColumn(
		ID_TIPUS_ESTACIO,
		COD_MOD_CARRETERA,
		COD_TRAM = FiltraCampos2@COD_TRAM,
		COD_SUBTRAM = FiltraCampos2@COD_SUBTRAM,
		COD_CARRETERA = FiltraCampos2@COD_CARRETERA,
		PK_INI = FiltraCampos2@PK_INI,
		METRES_PK_INI = FiltraCampos2@METRES_PK_INI,
		PK_FI = FiltraCampos2@PK_FI,
		METRES_PK_FI = FiltraCampos2@METRES_PK_FI,
		IND_IMD,
		IND_PESANTS,
		DESC_PROVINCIA,
		DATA_ANY_PLA,
		COD_ORG_TRAM = COD_ORGTRAM,
		COD_ORGANISME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FiltraCampos3
CalculaIND select(mapColumn(
		ID_TIPUS_ESTACIO,
		DESC_AMBIT_TERRITORIAL = COD_ORGANISME,
		DESC_PROVINCIA,
		IND_LONGITUD,
		IND_IMD,
		IND_PESANTS,
		DATA_ANY_PLA,
		COD_ORG_TRAM
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenombraOrdena
RenombraOrdena split(COD_ORG_TRAM == 'DIR',
	COD_ORG_TRAM != 'DES' && COD_ORG_TRAM !='DIR',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(IDOrgTramDIR, IDOrgTramNoDIR, Default)
ConditionalSplit1@IDOrgTramNoDIR derive(DESC_AMBIT_TERRITORIAL = '') ~> AmbitNull
ConditionalSplit1@IDOrgTramDIR, AmbitNull, Default union(byName: true)~> Union1
ConditionalSplit1@Default select(mapColumn(
		ID_TIPUS_ESTACIO,
		DESC_AMBIT_TERRITORIAL,
		DESC_PROVINCIA,
		IND_LONGITUD,
		IND_IMD,
		IND_PESANTS,
		DATA_ANY_PLA,
		COD_ORG_TRAM
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Default
Union1 derive(DESC_AMBIT_TERRITORIAL = case(DESC_AMBIT_TERRITORIAL == 'STCB' || DESC_AMBIT_TERRITORIAL == 'DIB', 'Barcelona', 
    DESC_AMBIT_TERRITORIAL == 'STCG' || DESC_AMBIT_TERRITORIAL == 'DIG','Girona',
    DESC_AMBIT_TERRITORIAL == 'STCL' || DESC_AMBIT_TERRITORIAL == 'DIL','Lleida',  
    DESC_AMBIT_TERRITORIAL == 'STCT' || DESC_AMBIT_TERRITORIAL == 'DIT','Tarragona',  
    DESC_AMBIT_TERRITORIAL == 'STCE' || DESC_AMBIT_TERRITORIAL == 'STME','Terres de lEbre',  
    DESC_AMBIT_TERRITORIAL == 'STCG' || DESC_AMBIT_TERRITORIAL == 'DIG','Girona',    
    'Carreteres en concessiÃ³')) ~> AmbitTerritorialIMD
AmbitTerritorialIMD derive(IND_IMD_LONGITUD = iif( isNull(IND_IMD),toDecimal(0),IND_IMD*IND_LONGITUD),
		IND_IMD_PESANTS = iif( isNull(IND_IMD),toDecimal(0),IND_LONGITUD*IND_PESANTS)) ~> IMDLongIMDPesants
IMDLongIMDPesants derive(NUM_RANK = case(IND_IMD<=1000, 0,
    1001<=IND_IMD && IND_IMD<=2000, 1,
    2001<=IND_IMD && IND_IMD<=5000, 2,
    5001<=IND_IMD && IND_IMD<=10000, 3,
    10001<=IND_IMD && IND_IMD<=15000, 4,
    15001<=IND_IMD && IND_IMD<=20000, 5,
    20001<=IND_IMD && IND_IMD<=50000, 6,
    50001<=IND_IMD && IND_IMD<=80000, 7,
    80001<=IND_IMD && IND_IMD<=100000, 8,
     9)) ~> AddRank
AddRank sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ID_TIPUS_ESTACIO as decimal(2,0),
		DESC_AMBIT_TERRITORIAL as string,
		DESC_PROVINCIA as string,
		IND_LONGITUD as decimal(10,2),
		IND_IMD as decimal(8,0),
		IND_PESANTS as decimal(10,2),
		DATA_ANY_PLA as integer,
		COD_ORG_TRAM as string,
		IND_IMD_LONGITUD as decimal(19,2),
		IND_IMD_PESANTS as decimal(21,4),
		NUM_RANK as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DMFactResumVehicleRank
